project-challenges: Identifying keys components to reduce server load, optimizing the summarization.
project-purpose:
Summarizes the latest news articles into 1 sentence.
Categorizes it. And can be searched by keyword.
project-inspiration:
While millions of news articles are published every day, I realized that relevancy and terseness was key.
Identifying that this solution could be implemented by machine learning & pattern recognition led to the birth of 1News.
Delivering news in its simplest form and fresh is what 1News aims for.
project-lessons-learned: Learning and building for HipChat. APIs endpoints and rich developer docs.
project-accomplishments: Building the product as a modular project.
